description: Prosecutors say Stig Engstrom, who killed himself in 2000, was the man who shot Olof Palme in 1986.
title: Olof Palme murder: Sweden believes it knows who killed PM in 1986
title_page: Olof Palme murder: Sweden believes it knows who killed PM in 1986 - BBC News
maintext: With no new forensic evidence or links to a gun, many are asking why it took investigators so long to reach their conclusion, which was largely the result of combing through witness statements taken from Stig Engstrom and others at the scene. Others are angry that the suspect, who died in 2000, will never be brought to justice.
